actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from DOD.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to issue a special identification card to each member of the Armed Forces who was deployed in the Persian Gulf theater of operation, or was ordered to active duty, in connection with the Persian Gulf conflict.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to issue a special identification card to each member of the armed forces who: (1) served in the Persian Gulf in connection with the Persian Gulf conflict; or (2) as a member of the reserves, was ordered to active duty in connection with such conflict.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to issue a special identification card to each member of the Armed Forces who was deployed in the Persian Gulf theater of operation, or was ordered to active duty, in connection with the Persian Gulf conflict.
